class
    grouping
    numeric 

typeof
    refer to exact type

##### numeric data

```{r}
x <- 10
y <- 2L
typeof(x)
typeof(y)
is.integer(y)
```

```{r}
class(2.6) # numeric
class(2.6 + 4L) # numeric data
typeof(4)
```

1 FLOAT - 255KB
1 INTEGER - 20KB
1 DOUBLE - 100KB

```{r}
typeof(5L / 2L) # INEGER DIVISION

```

##### character data

```{r}
x <- "data"
class(x)
typeof(x)
```


```{r}
y <- factor("data")
class(y)
typeof(y)
```

```{r}
nchar(x)

nchar("hello")

nchar(3)

nchar(452)
```


```{r}
x <- as.Date("10-12-2025")
class(x)

typeof(x)

as.numeric(x)
class(x)
```


```{r}
k <- TRUE
class(k)

is.logical(k)
```
